tool_description: Analyzes bibliography entries for completeness, identifying missing required fields and suggesting improvements for citation quality.

citation_entries.description: Array of citation entries to analyze for completeness

citation_style.description: Citation style to check requirements against

publication_types.description: Expected publication types for requirement checking

strictness_level.description: Analysis strictness: strict, moderate, or lenient

error_messages: Empty citation entries: Provide at least one citation entry for analysis.
Unsupported citation style: Use one of [APA, MLA, Chicago, IEEE, Harvard, Vancouver].
Invalid publication types: Use valid types from [journal, book, conference, thesis, website].
Invalid strictness level: Use one of [strict, moderate, lenient].
Analysis failed: Unable to analyze citations due to parsing errors.
usage: Submit citation entries with style specification to receive detailed completeness analysis and recommendations for improvement.

complete_citations.description: Number of citations meeting completeness requirements

incomplete_citations.description: Number of citations missing required fields

missing_fields.description: Most commonly missing fields across all citations

improvement_suggestions.description: Specific suggestions for improving citation completeness
